views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 11 and 12

fleetingSwitcher11 Gives the Opportunity to Get Useful and Visual options for the iOS 11 App Switcher!

More to Come in the Next Updates!

Configure options from Settings.

See Screenshots below.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.2.0 - Added support for arm64e/A12. Version 1.1
- Added the option to Make Bigger the Cards In the Switcher (included BigCards available on My Repo).
- Added the option to Enable the Mini Grid Style In the Switcher (included MiniGridSwitcher available on My Repo).


Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to Enable also the Grid Style of the iPad on the Switcher (Thanks eldar5581 for pointing me the proper direction).
- Changes in Prefs Labels Descriptions.


Version 1.0.8
- Added iOS 12 Full Support.
- Added Compatibility to Enable the Grid Style on iPhone X with iOS 12.
Version 1.0.7
- Added the option to Make Black the Cards Headers Container.
- As Requested on Twitter, Now the Showing Up of the HomeScreen Card to Swipe Up for Closing All Apps Feature is Bundled as an option to Enable/Disable on Demand.
- Code Cleanup/Improvements.


Version 1.0.6
- Included in the Tweak by Default the Showing Up of the HomeScreen Card in the Switcher in order to Swipe Up to Close All Apps Feature (thanks so much to SBCard Code by julioverne).
Version 1.0.5
- As Requested via Mail, added the option to Enable the Grid Style on the Switcher (Not Compatible on iPhone X, the Switcher Gesture on the iPhoneX won't work if Activated this option). Thanks to Kiet Ha for the Griddy Code.
- Code Cleaned.
Version 1.0.4
- Added the option to Hide The Blur on the Background of the Switcher.
Version 1.0.3-1
- Fixed the libcolorpicker Dependency Issue causing not Showing Up the Preference Panel (Sorry for the Inconvenience).


Version 1.0.3
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).

- Now you can Custom Select the Colors/Fade for the Background of your Switcher Application.


Version 1.0.2
- Added the option to Disable the App Suggestions In the Switcher (taken by My SleekSwitcher Tweak).
Version 1.0.1
- Added the option to Hide the Titles of the Switcher.
